panels.description: Host uptime refers to the time during which Host OS is operational, whereas IoTEdge Daemon uptime refers to the time during which Edge runtime is operational.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let startTimeRange = todatetime('${__from:date}');
let startTime = startofday(todatetime((startTimeRange)));

InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated > startTime
| where Name == "edgeAgent_iotedged_uptime_seconds"
| extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
| extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
| where device == '$device'
| project TimeGenerated, Val, Name="IoT Edge daemon"
| union (
     InsightsMetrics 
     | where TimeGenerated > startTime
     | where Name == "edgeAgent_host_uptime_seconds"
     | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
     | extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
     | where device == '$device'
     | project TimeGenerated, Val, Name="Host")
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by Name

panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: CPU, Memory and Disk usage of the Edge Device (Trustbox / VM)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
//Site level status 

// Set thresholds based on workbook parameter values.
let hostMemPercentThreshold = toint($hostMemPercentThreshold); // 80;
let hostCpuPercentThreshold = toint($hostCpuPercentThreshold); // 80;
let hostDiskPercentThreshold = toint($hostDiskPercentThreshold); // 90;
let localMessagesSentThreshold = toint($localMessagesSentThreshold); // 0;
let upstreamMessagesSentThreshold = toint($upstreamMessagesSentThreshold); // 0;
let qlenThreshold = toint($qlenThreshold); // 100;
let firstPanicNoDataThresholdMins = toint($firstPanicNoDataThresholdMins); // 30;
let secondPanicNoDataThresholdMins = max_of(firstPanicNoDataThresholdMins, toint($secondPanicNoDataThresholdMins)); // 120;
let startTime = todatetime('${__from:date}');
let endTime =  todatetime('${__to:date}');

//query
let _data = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated between (startTime .. endTime) // restrict the time window
    | extend iotresource = split(_ResourceId, "/")[-1]
    | extend device = strcat(iotresource, "/", extract("edge_device.:.([^,]+).,", 1, Tags, typeof(string)));    
    
let cpu_percent = _data
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_used_cpu_percent" and Tags contains_cs "host" and Tags contains_cs "0.99"
    | extend value = toint(Val)
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | summarize p95HostCpu=max(value) by device;
//
let totalMemByDevice = _data
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_total_memory_bytes" and Tags contains_cs "host"
    | extend value = tolong(Val)
    | project device, value, TimeGenerated
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | summarize total_bytes=max(value) by device;
//
let memUsedPercent = _data
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_used_memory_bytes" and Tags contains_cs "host"
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of Val by Ignore2=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | extend used_bytes = tolong(Val) 
    | project device, used_bytes, TimeGenerated
    | join kind=leftouter totalMemByDevice on $left.device == $right.device
    | extend mem_used_percent = (todouble(used_bytes) / todouble(total_bytes)) * 100
    | extend mem_used_percent = round(mem_used_percent, 0)
    | summarize p95HostMem=max(mem_used_percent) by device;
//
let cpu_and_mem = memUsedPercent
    | join cpu_percent on $left.device == $right.device
    | project-away device1;
//
let totalBytesByDevice = _data
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_total_disk_space_bytes"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend value = tolong(Val)
    | extend diskname = tostring(dimensions.disk_name)
    | extend diskfs = tostring(dimensions.disk_filesystem)
    | where diskfs != "overlay"
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1),
      top-nested of diskname by Ignore3=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | project device, diskname, value, TimeGenerated
    | summarize Bytes=max(value) by device, diskname
    | summarize totalBytes=sum(Bytes) by device;
//
let used_disk_trend = _data
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_available_disk_space_bytes"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend value = tolong(Val)
    | extend diskname = tostring(dimensions.disk_name)
    | extend diskfs = tostring(dimensions.disk_filesystem)
    | where diskfs != "overlay"
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1),
      top-nested of diskname by Ignore3=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | project device, diskname, value, TimeGenerated
    | summarize Bytes=max(value) by device, diskname, TimeGenerated
    | summarize availBytes=sum(Bytes) by device, TimeGenerated
    | join kind=leftouter
        totalBytesByDevice
        on $left.device == $right.device
    | extend percentUsed = round((todouble(totalBytes) - todouble(availBytes)) / todouble(totalBytes) * 100, 0)
    | project TimeGenerated, device, percentUsed
    | summarize p95Disk=max(percentUsed) by device;
//
let cpu_mem_disk = cpu_and_mem
    | join
        used_disk_trend
        on $left.device == $right.device
    | project-away device1;
//
let p95QlenByDevice = _data
    | where Name == "edgehub_queue_length"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend ep = tostring(dimensions.endpoint)
    | extend qlen = iif(Val > 0x7FFFFFFFFFFFFFFF, toreal(0), Val)
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of qlen by Ignore2=max(1),
      top-nested of ep by Ignore3=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | project device, qlen, ep, TimeGenerated
    | summarize sum(qlen) by TimeGenerated, device
    | summarize p95QLen = max_of(0, max(sum_qlen)) by device;
//
let lastUpdateTimeByDevice = _data
    | where Name == "edgehub_gettwin_total" or Name == "edgeAgent_total_time_running_correctly_seconds"
    | project TimeGenerated, device
    | summarize lastUpdateTime=max(TimeGenerated) by device;
//
let p95QlenByDeviceAndLastUpdate = p95QlenByDevice 
    | join kind=rightouter lastUpdateTimeByDevice on device
    | extend device=device1
    | project-away device1
    | extend lastUpdatedSeconds = tolong(datetime_diff('second', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend lastUpdatedMins = tolong(datetime_diff('minute', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend lastUpdatedHours = tolong(datetime_diff('hour', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend lastUpdatedDays = tolong(datetime_diff('day', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend agoText = case(lastUpdatedSeconds <= 60, strcat("seen ", lastUpdatedSeconds, iff(lastUpdatedSeconds == 1, " sec ago", " secs ago")),
        lastUpdatedSeconds <= 3600, strcat("seen ", lastUpdatedMins, iff(lastUpdatedMins == 1, " min ago", " mins ago")), 
        lastUpdatedSeconds <= 86400, strcat("seen ", lastUpdatedHours, iff(lastUpdatedHours == 1, " hr ago", " hrs ago")),
        strcat("ðŸ‘€ ", lastUpdatedDays, iff(lastUpdatedDays > 1, " days ago", " day ago")))
    | project agoText, device, p95QLen, lastUpdatedMins;
//
let qlenAndLastUpdate = p95QlenByDeviceAndLastUpdate
    | join kind=leftouter
        cpu_mem_disk
        on $left.device == $right.device
    | project-away device1;
// Local and upstream messages
let recentMessageCount = _data
    | where Name == "edgehub_messages_sent_total"
    | project TimeGenerated, device, Val, Tags
    | partition hint.strategy=native by device (
        sort by device, TimeGenerated desc 
        | extend target = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", extract("to.:.([^,]+).,", 1, Tags, typeof(string))) // using extract which is faster than extractjson
        | extend isupstream = target has "Upstream"
        | extend source = strcat(device, "::", trim_start(@"[^/]+/", extract("from.:.([^,]+).,", 1, Tags, typeof(string))))
        | extend sourceTarget = strcat(source, "::", target)
        | summarize msgCounts = make_list(Val)
                 by device, source, sourceTarget, isupstream
    )
    | extend diffs = series_subtract(msgCounts, array_shift_left(msgCounts, 1, toint(msgCounts[-1]))), zeroes = repeat(0, array_length(msgCounts))
    | extend diffs = array_iff(series_greater(diffs, zeroes), diffs, zeroes)
    | extend latestDiff = max_of(toint(diffs[0]), 0)
    | summarize recentUpstreamMessages = sumif(latestDiff, isupstream),
                totalUpstreamMessages = sumif(array_sum(diffs), isupstream),
                recentLocalMessages = sumif(latestDiff, not(isupstream)),
                totalLocalMessages = sumif(array_sum(diffs), not(isupstream))
             by device;
// Final join
qlenAndLastUpdate
| join kind=leftouter recentMessageCount 
    on device
| project-away device1
| extend healthIndicator = 
    iff((p95HostMem < hostMemPercentThreshold 
        and p95HostCpu < hostCpuPercentThreshold 
        and p95Disk < hostDiskPercentThreshold 
        and p95QLen < qlenThreshold),
        iff(lastUpdatedMins < firstPanicNoDataThresholdMins, 0, 1),
        2
    )
| extend healthIndicator = 
    iff(lastUpdatedMins > secondPanicNoDataThresholdMins,
        1,
        iff((isnull(p95HostMem) or p95HostMem < hostMemPercentThreshold) 
            and (isnull(p95HostCpu) or p95HostCpu < hostCpuPercentThreshold)
            and (isnull(p95Disk) or p95Disk < hostDiskPercentThreshold)
            and (isnull(p95QLen) or p95QLen < qlenThreshold) 
            and (recentLocalMessages >= localMessagesSentThreshold or localMessagesSentThreshold == 0)
            and (recentUpstreamMessages >= upstreamMessagesSentThreshold or upstreamMessagesSentThreshold == 0),
            0,
            2
        )
    )
| extend statusHelper = 
    case(
        lastUpdatedMins > secondPanicNoDataThresholdMins, -2,
        lastUpdatedMins > firstPanicNoDataThresholdMins, -1,
        healthIndicator
    )
| extend healthText = 
    case(
        statusHelper == 0, "Healthy",
        statusHelper == 1, "Unhealthy",
        statusHelper == 2, "Unhealthy",
        "Unknown"
    )
// | where healthText in ({healthStatus})
//     and (p95QLen >= tolong({minQLen}) or isnull(p95QLen))
//     and (p95HostMem >= tolong({minMem}) or isnull(p95HostMem))
//     and (p95HostCpu >= tolong({minCpu}) or isnull(p95HostCpu))
//     and (p95Disk >= tolong({minDisk}) or isnull(p95Disk))
//     and (lastUpdatedMins >= {minLastSeen} or isnull(lastUpdatedMins))
| extend iotresource_device = split(device, "/")
| extend iotresource = tostring(iotresource_device[0])
| extend device = tostring(iotresource_device[1])
| extend resourceIndex = array_index_of(split("{IoTResources:name}", ", "), iotresource)
| extend iotResourceId = trim("'", tostring(split("{IoTResources}", ",")[resourceIndex]))
| where device == '$device'
| project  p95HostCpu, p95HostMem, p95Disk

panels.title: Device Usage

panels.description: Outages when no new telemetry is ingested within the last 30 minutes

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let startTime = '${__from:date}';
let endTime = '${__to:date}';
customEvents
| where timestamp between (todatetime(startTime) .. todatetime(endTime))
| where name has "FullOutageAlert"
| extend dimensions=parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend metrics=parse_json(customMeasurements)
| extend customer = tostring(dimensions.CustomerName)
| extend connectorName = tostring(dimensions.ConnectorName)
| extend thirdPartyConsumers = tostring(dimensions.ThirdPartyConsumers)
| extend connectorType = strcat(trim_start('Default',tostring(dimensions.ConnectorType)),"Module")
| extend module=strcat(connectorName,"-",connectorType) 
| where customer =~ '$customerName'
| where connectorName contains extract("([0-9.]+)", 1, '$device') or connectorName contains '$device' 
| project timestamp, name, connectorName,connectorType, thirdPartyConsumers
| order by timestamp desc

panels.title: Full Outage

azureLogAnalytics.query:
//Set thresholds based on workbook parameter values.
let hostMemPercentThreshold = toint($hostMemPercentThreshold); // 80;
let hostCpuPercentThreshold = toint($hostCpuPercentThreshold); // 80;
let hostDiskPercentThreshold = toint($hostDiskPercentThreshold); // 90;
let localMessagesSentThreshold = toint($localMessagesSentThreshold); // 0;
let upstreamMessagesSentThreshold = toint($upstreamMessagesSentThreshold); // 0;
let qlenThreshold = toint($qlenThreshold); // 100;
let firstPanicNoDataThresholdMins = toint($firstPanicNoDataThresholdMins); // 30;
let secondPanicNoDataThresholdMins = max_of(firstPanicNoDataThresholdMins, toint($secondPanicNoDataThresholdMins)); // 120;
let startTime = todatetime('${__from:date}');
let endTime =  todatetime('${__to:date}');

//query
let _data = InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated between (startTime .. endTime) // restrict the time window
    | extend iotresource = split(_ResourceId, "/")[-1]
    | extend device = strcat(iotresource, "/", extract("edge_device.:.([^,]+).,", 1, Tags, typeof(string)))
    | where device contains '$device';
let cpu_percent = _data
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_used_cpu_percent" and Tags contains_cs "host" and Tags contains_cs "0.99"
    | extend value = toint(Val)
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | summarize p95HostCpu=max(value) by device;
//
let totalMemByDevice = _data
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_total_memory_bytes" and Tags contains_cs "host"
    | extend value = tolong(Val)
    | project device, value, TimeGenerated
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | summarize total_bytes=max(value) by device;
//
let memUsedPercent = _data
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_used_memory_bytes" and Tags contains_cs "host"
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of Val by Ignore2=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | extend used_bytes = tolong(Val) 
    | project device, used_bytes, TimeGenerated
    | join kind=leftouter totalMemByDevice on $left.device == $right.device
    | extend mem_used_percent = (todouble(used_bytes) / todouble(total_bytes)) * 100
    | extend mem_used_percent = round(mem_used_percent, 0)
    | summarize p95HostMem=max(mem_used_percent) by device;
//
let cpu_and_mem = memUsedPercent
    | join cpu_percent on $left.device == $right.device
    | project-away device1;
//
let totalBytesByDevice = _data
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_total_disk_space_bytes"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend value = tolong(Val)
    | extend diskname = tostring(dimensions.disk_name)
    | extend diskfs = tostring(dimensions.disk_filesystem)
    | where diskfs != "overlay"
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1),
      top-nested of diskname by Ignore3=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | project device, diskname, value, TimeGenerated
    | summarize Bytes=max(value) by device, diskname
    | summarize totalBytes=sum(Bytes) by device;
//
let used_disk_trend = _data
    | where Name == "edgeAgent_available_disk_space_bytes"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend value = tolong(Val)
    | extend diskname = tostring(dimensions.disk_name)
    | extend diskfs = tostring(dimensions.disk_filesystem)
    | where diskfs != "overlay"
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of value by Ignore2=max(1),
      top-nested of diskname by Ignore3=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | project device, diskname, value, TimeGenerated
    | summarize Bytes=max(value) by device, diskname, TimeGenerated
    | summarize availBytes=sum(Bytes) by device, TimeGenerated
    | join kind=leftouter
        totalBytesByDevice
        on $left.device == $right.device
    | extend percentUsed = round((todouble(totalBytes) - todouble(availBytes)) / todouble(totalBytes) * 100, 0)
    | project TimeGenerated, device, percentUsed
    | summarize p95Disk=max(percentUsed) by device;
//
let cpu_mem_disk = cpu_and_mem
    | join
        used_disk_trend
        on $left.device == $right.device
    | project-away device1;
//
let p95QlenByDevice = _data
    | where Name == "edgehub_queue_length"
    | extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
    | extend ep = tostring(dimensions.endpoint)
    | extend qlen = iif(Val > 0x7FFFFFFFFFFFFFFF, toreal(0), Val)
    | top-nested of device by Ignore0=max(1),
      top-nested 3 of TimeGenerated by Ignore1=max(TimeGenerated),
      top-nested of qlen by Ignore2=max(1),
      top-nested of ep by Ignore3=max(1)
    | project-away Ignore*
    | project device, qlen, ep, TimeGenerated
    | summarize sum(qlen) by TimeGenerated, device
    | summarize p95QLen = max_of(0, max(sum_qlen)) by device;
//
let lastUpdateTimeByDevice = _data
    | where Name == "edgehub_gettwin_total" or Name == "edgeAgent_total_time_running_correctly_seconds"
    | project TimeGenerated, device
    | summarize lastUpdateTime=max(TimeGenerated) by device;
//
let p95QlenByDeviceAndLastUpdate = p95QlenByDevice 
    | join kind=rightouter lastUpdateTimeByDevice on device
    | extend device=device1
    | project-away device1
    | extend lastUpdatedSeconds = tolong(datetime_diff('second', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend lastUpdatedMins = tolong(datetime_diff('minute', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend lastUpdatedHours = tolong(datetime_diff('hour', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend lastUpdatedDays = tolong(datetime_diff('day', now(), lastUpdateTime))
    | extend agoText = case(lastUpdatedSeconds <= 60, strcat("seen ", lastUpdatedSeconds, iff(lastUpdatedSeconds == 1, " sec ago", " secs ago")),
        lastUpdatedSeconds <= 3600, strcat("seen ", lastUpdatedMins, iff(lastUpdatedMins == 1, " min ago", " mins ago")), 
        lastUpdatedSeconds <= 86400, strcat("seen ", lastUpdatedHours, iff(lastUpdatedHours == 1, " hr ago", " hrs ago")),
        strcat("ðŸ‘€ ", lastUpdatedDays, iff(lastUpdatedDays > 1, " days ago", " day ago")))
    | project agoText, device, p95QLen, lastUpdatedMins;
//
let qlenAndLastUpdate = p95QlenByDeviceAndLastUpdate
    | join kind=leftouter
        cpu_mem_disk
        on $left.device == $right.device
    | project-away device1;
// Local and upstream messages
let recentMessageCount = _data
    | where Name == "edgehub_messages_sent_total"
    | project TimeGenerated, device, Val, Tags
    | partition hint.strategy=native by device (
        sort by device, TimeGenerated desc 
        | extend target = trim_start(@"[^/]+/", extract("to.:.([^,]+).,", 1, Tags, typeof(string))) // using extract which is faster than extractjson
        | extend isupstream = target has "Upstream"
        | extend source = strcat(device, "::", trim_start(@"[^/]+/", extract("from.:.([^,]+).,", 1, Tags, typeof(string))))
        | extend sourceTarget = strcat(source, "::", target)
        | summarize msgCounts = make_list(Val)
                 by device, source, sourceTarget, isupstream
    )
    | extend diffs = series_subtract(msgCounts, array_shift_left(msgCounts, 1, toint(msgCounts[-1]))), zeroes = repeat(0, array_length(msgCounts))
    | extend diffs = array_iff(series_greater(diffs, zeroes), diffs, zeroes)
    | extend latestDiff = max_of(toint(diffs[0]), 0)
    | summarize recentUpstreamMessages = sumif(latestDiff, isupstream),
                totalUpstreamMessages = sumif(array_sum(diffs), isupstream),
                recentLocalMessages = sumif(latestDiff, not(isupstream)),
                totalLocalMessages = sumif(array_sum(diffs), not(isupstream))
             by device;
// Final join
let cpu_memory_status = qlenAndLastUpdate
| join kind=leftouter recentMessageCount 
    on device
| project-away device1
| extend healthIndicator = 
    iff((p95HostMem < hostMemPercentThreshold 
        and p95HostCpu < hostCpuPercentThreshold 
        and p95Disk < hostDiskPercentThreshold 
        and p95QLen < qlenThreshold),
        iff(lastUpdatedMins < firstPanicNoDataThresholdMins, 0, 1),
        2
    )
| extend healthIndicator = 
    iff(lastUpdatedMins > secondPanicNoDataThresholdMins,
        1,
        iff((isnull(p95HostMem) or p95HostMem < hostMemPercentThreshold) 
            and (isnull(p95HostCpu) or p95HostCpu < hostCpuPercentThreshold)
            and (isnull(p95Disk) or p95Disk < hostDiskPercentThreshold)
            and (isnull(p95QLen) or p95QLen < qlenThreshold) 
            and (recentLocalMessages >= localMessagesSentThreshold or localMessagesSentThreshold == 0)
            and (recentUpstreamMessages >= upstreamMessagesSentThreshold or upstreamMessagesSentThreshold == 0),
            0,
            2
        )
    )
| extend statusHelper = 
    case(
        lastUpdatedMins > secondPanicNoDataThresholdMins, -2,
        lastUpdatedMins > firstPanicNoDataThresholdMins, -1,
        healthIndicator
    )
| extend healthText = 
    case(
        statusHelper == 0, "Healthy",
        statusHelper == 1, "Unhealthy",
        statusHelper == 2, "Unhealthy",
        "Unknown"
    )
// | where healthText in ({healthStatus})
//     and (p95QLen >= tolong({minQLen}) or isnull(p95QLen))
//     and (p95HostMem >= tolong({minMem}) or isnull(p95HostMem))
//     and (p95HostCpu >= tolong({minCpu}) or isnull(p95HostCpu))
//     and (p95Disk >= tolong({minDisk}) or isnull(p95Disk))
//     and (lastUpdatedMins >= {minLastSeen} or isnull(lastUpdatedMins))
| extend iotresource_device = split(device, "/")
| extend iotresource = tostring(iotresource_device[0])
| extend device = tostring(iotresource_device[1])
| extend resourceIndex = array_index_of(split("{IoTResources:name}", ", "), iotresource)
| extend iotResourceId = trim("'", tostring(split("{IoTResources}", ",")[resourceIndex]))
| project device, measure='CPU & Memory', healthText
| order by   device asc;
// lastUpdatedMins,  iotresource ,healthIndicator, iotResourceId,  statusHelper, agoText, lastUpdatedMins, p95QLen, p95HostCpu, p95HostMem, p95Disk, recentLocalMessages, recentUpstreamMessages, totalLocalMessages, totalUpstreamMessages,
//           hostCpuPercentThreshold, hostMemPercentThreshold, hostDiskPercentThreshold, localMessagesSentThreshold, upstreamMessagesSentThreshold, qlenThreshold,
//           firstPanicNoDataThresholdMins, secondPanicNoDataThresholdMins
let cpu_memory_status_has_records = toscalar(cpu_memory_status | summarize count() > 0);
union 
(cpu_memory_status | where cpu_memory_status_has_records == true),
(datatable(device:string, measure: string, healthText: string)['$device','CPU & Memory', 'Unhealthy'] | where cpu_memory_status_has_records == false);

panels.description: CPU usage of edge module deployed on a device

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let startTime = todatetime('${__from:date}');
let endTime =  todatetime('${__to:date}');
let minPeriod = time('${__interval}');

InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated between ((startTime - minPeriod) .. endTime)
| where Name == "edgeAgent_used_cpu_percent"
| extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
| extend quantile = tostring(dimensions.quantile)
| where quantile == "0.9"
| extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
| where device == '$device'
| extend module = tostring(dimensions.module_name)
| where module != "host"  
| extend value = todouble(Val)
| order by TimeGenerated, module, value
| make-series CPU=max(value) on TimeGenerated from startTime to endTime step minPeriod by module
| mv-expand CPU, TimeGenerated
| extend  CPU = todecimal(CPU), TimeGenerated = todatetime(TimeGenerated), module=replace_regex(module,'-([A-Za-z0-9]*)ConnectorModule$','')
| evaluate pivot (module,max(CPU))
// | summarize CPU = max(CPU) by module, TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated asc;

panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory usage of each edge modules deployed on a device

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let startTime = todatetime('${__from:date}');
let endTime =  todatetime('${__to:date}');
let minPeriod = time('${__interval}');
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated between ((startTime - minPeriod) .. endTime)
| where Name == "edgeAgent_used_memory_bytes"
| extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
| extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
| where device == '$device'
| extend module = tostring(dimensions.module_name)
| where module != "host"  
| extend value = tolong(Val)
| order by TimeGenerated, module, value
| make-series Memory=max(value) on TimeGenerated from startTime to endTime step minPeriod by module
| mv-expand Memory, TimeGenerated
| extend  Memory = todecimal(Memory), TimeGenerated = todatetime(TimeGenerated), module=replace_regex(module,'-([A-Za-z0-9]*)ConnectorModule$','')
| evaluate pivot (module,max(Memory))
| order by TimeGenerated asc;

panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Logs when full outages is auto-resolved
panels.title: AutoResolver Logs

panels.description: Outages when telemetry ingested is less than expected.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let startTime = '${__from:date}';
let endTime = '${__to:date}';

customEvents
| where timestamp between (todatetime(startTime) .. todatetime(endTime))
| where name has "PartialOutageAlert" 
| extend dimensions=parse_json(customDimensions)
| extend metrics=parse_json(customMeasurements)
| extend customer = tostring(dimensions.CustomerName)
| extend connectorName = tostring(dimensions.ConnectorName)
| extend thirdPartyConsumers = tostring(dimensions.ThirdPartyConsumers)
| extend connectorType = strcat(trim_start('Default',tostring(dimensions.ConnectorType)),"Module")
| extend activeCapability = tostring(metrics.ActiveCapabilities)
| extend TrendingCapabilities = tostring(metrics.TrendingCapabilities)
| extend ActualPercentage = tostring(dimensions.['Actual%'])
| extend MinimumPercentage = tostring(dimensions.['Minimum%'])
| extend DegradedTrendingCapabilitiesAdxAlert = tostring(metrics.DegradedTrendingCapabilitiesAdxAlert)
| extend module=strcat(connectorName,"-",connectorType) 
| where customer =~ '$customerName'
| where connectorName contains extract("([0-9.]+)", 1, '$device') or connectorName contains '$device' 
| project timestamp, name, connectorName,connectorType, thirdPartyConsumers, module,  activeCapability, TrendingCapabilities, ActualPercentage, MinimumPercentage, DegradedTrendingCapabilitiesAdxAlert
| order by timestamp desc

panels.title: Partial Outage

azureLogAnalytics.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| extend dimensions=parse_json(Tags)
| extend device = tostring(dimensions.edge_device)
| where isnotempty(device) 
| distinct device
